it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.comm

Class BluetoothConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.comm.BluetoothConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection<BluetoothConnection.BluetoothChannel>

    public class BluetoothConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connection<BluetoothConnection.BluetoothChannel>
    This class implements a Connection between the Android device and the EV3 via the Bluetooth protocol. Instances of this class do not represent an active connection but rather a factory for creating the actual connection channel. The type of the channel is the inner class BluetoothConnection.BluetoothChannel.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BluetoothConnection.BluetoothChannel
      This inner non-static class represents an active bluetooth channel through which the two connected devices communicate sending commands and receiving replies.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BluetoothConnection(java.lang.String name)
      Create an object given the name of the EV3 device, as configured on the brick settings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BluetoothConnection.BluetoothChannel connect()
      Create a channel for communication.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BluetoothConnection

        public BluetoothConnection(@NonNull
                           java.lang.String name)
        Create an object given the name of the EV3 device, as configured on the brick settings.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the EV3 device. LEGO factory settings default to "EV3".

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        @NonNull
public BluetoothConnection.BluetoothChannel connect()
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Create a channel for communication. Multiple calls to this method do not produce multiple channels: only one active channel is supported. This method internally performs the bluetooth discovery, searching among paired devices for the device whose name has been passed as argument to the constructor.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface Connection<BluetoothConnection.BluetoothChannel>
        Returns:
        an object of type BluetoothConnection.BluetoothChannel.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when communication errors occur.
